bug.author: mouradmourafiq
bug.summary: Table comparison should reset information when switching between kinds
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Describe the bug</denchmark-h>
It seems that comparison view is caching more info than needed, namely it's keeping state information about: columns/query/sort <denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Go the jobs comparison view, then go to matrices/dags/services Notice some columns that are not part of the comparison primitive
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
All information about the state should be reinitialized/removed from the cache when changing run kind. <denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
1.0.96
